title: My league client wont open and i dont know what to do
body:
after the patch and my client wont open anymore

try to reinstall, it either says repairing and nothing happen or repairing failed and nothing happened

tried everything already

need help ASAP

replies.body: {{champion:267}} Hi, as I see you double posted this but the other one is in the correct subboard, I will be locking this one up. Please also see any removal notifications you have for further advice.
Not a reason to double post.
